bio:
Akorithi lives in Solitude, the provincial capital of Skyrim. She is a Redguard woman with green eyes and long dark brown hair. Her left cheek has significantly visible scarring from a past injury.
She has a stand at marketplace, at which she sells food. She mostly sells meats, both cooked and raw.
She sleeps at the Imperial Alehouse, a lodging facility at which several other merchants also spend the night.
name: Akorithi
